com.mygdx.pirategame.gameobjects

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • com.mygdx.pirategame.gameobjects.Player

  • public class Player
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
    Creates the class of the player. Everything that involves actions coming from the player boat

      • fire

        public void fire(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
        Called when left button is pressed. One cannonball is launched towards the mouse position from the centre of the player.
        Parameters:
        camera - The camera that is in charge of scaling

      • setCannonVelocity

        Parameters:
